description: Rui Pinto says he is a whistleblower not a hacker and acted to expose corruption in football.
title: Rui Pinto Football Leaks trial starts in Portugal
title_page: Rui Pinto Football Leaks trial starts in Portugal - BBC News
maintext: He was arrested in January 2019 and two months later Hungary extradited him to Portugal, where he was first kept in solitary detention and later moved to house arrest. That house arrest was lifted last month.
